subtitle: To make this a really special brunch dish, use mixed and wild mushrooms.

method.text: Mix the garlic into the butter.
Dry fry the bacon in a non-stick frying pan for 3 min.
Add the mushrooms with the garlic butter and pine nuts. Cook for 2-5 min until mushrooms are tender. Season.
Toast or grill the slices of Ciabatta until crisp and golden.
Arrange the Ciabatta on serving plates. Pile on the mushroom mixture. Sprinkle over the chives.

title: Bacon and mushrooms on Ciabatta toasts
